title: Permabanned :(
body: Okay so I had 2 games in a row where I said like 1 or 2 things that I shouldn't have. And my entire team reported me cause they were toxic and hated me. Now I try my best to follow the rules. The first had a toxic MF support who said we banned their other supports. Had no keystones and said that they wouldn't go the free one because they wanted to carry. The second game had a toxic Tristana malzahar and soraka. They were spamming noob rengar please report. I said almost nothing bad that game or the earlier one. No racism homophobia etc. Compared to them I wasn't toxic at all. And i got banned? Riot is there anything you can do? I can't submit a support ticket cause I can't log in there. Thanks, I hope i can continue to have fun times playing this game :)

I took a look into your ban and chat logs. You're right, you weren't using hate speech at all, and that's really good. However we do see that you were still abusing chat in game by being argumentative, calling for reports of players, and provoking players in all chat as well. You're still using chat in ways that aren't positive, let alone what it's intended for, and that's what led to the ban. :(

Noticed that you already sent a ticket to Behavior regarding this. I can't guarantee they'll reconsider the ban, but they should respond soon so they can discuss it further with you one on one, and in private setting, which is better than I can do. If they do lift it though, please try to reform off of this. When players flame and provoke you, don't fall to their level when you have a game to win! Mute them so you don't hear what they say, and focus on the positive players or just doing the best you can!

Doesn't Riot follow a Warn, then chat restrict, then 14 day ban, and more 14 day bans until the player continues to be bad or is extreme toxic (death threats etc)? You guys just jump to perma bans now? Just wondering about policy thanks.

Typically that is the pattern for punishments. There are extreme cases though that can skip levels of punishment for a player; for example, hate speech. :(

You can ask the specialist in the ticket more about that, but a good read for those policies is in our [**Support article here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q2).

Sadly, not on Boards; I can't share any chat logs here since it's not a private setting. That's why I encourage sticking to that ticket with Behavior. A one on one conversation in private is the best thing Support can offer you for this, and likely they'll oblige sharing any logs you request to show where you may have slipped up in chat.

That said, like I mentioned before in these scenarios I don't see you using hate speech. But there were still lengthy cases of negativity in chat despite that.

So I haven't had a chat ban before. I had 1 14 day ban and I'm sorry about those 2 games today. I fight back for what I feel is right. And people I don't know spamming that I'm a noob and to please report me in all chat for being a noob is not something I want.
